aka: The Third World After the Sun
this_title: El tercer mundo después del sol
trans_title: The Third World After the Sun
introduction: In the dense Colombian jungle, eras jump, genders blur and fluids flow freely. The rubber trees, tapped for their viscous sap, take on another connotation of kink while a 15th century European Missionary tries to tame what is inherently savage. In the thicket of trees, all things are wild, animalistic and queer.
chinese_title: El tercer mundo después del sol
